name: NEUROFARM
description:
These little AI harvesters are very hard-working, but not extremely smart.
Help them farm all the vegetables by tuning their program.  

HELP: When a robot encounters a control point, it will re-paint it into a new color and make a turn, determined by the rules you set up in the top left corner of the screen. Collect all the vegetables in order to unlock a new level.

Made for WOWIE jam 4.0 by Instant Regret Games
